nodes.bodyText: If track file format is not set KML format is used by default, why not KMZ?

I thought of privacy first, but from a usability perspective that might be weird.
So, let's move to KMZ with all the data for this case.
Thanks.
And I will move the default definition into the values/settings.xml.
This is how it was done for all other preferences and consistency is king :)
